By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, February 17, 2009 - 07:08 pm:

Tecmo is looking for someone to publish it in the US. You can try writing to Agetec to try and get them to do it. Check out the thread in the November Cafe section about my trip to Tokyo, address info is there.

Honestly, I'd just get the JP version, since we're at least a year away from seeing a North American version, if at all.
